attributes.action: Save £1.5m per year death penalty Murderers
attributes.additional_details: If Murderers, Rapists and paeodofiles (admitting to being guilty or 100% proven) were given the death penalty it would save the country and economy £1.5m per year, per inmate. If these horrific people take away the rights of others, why not have their rights stripped. It would also add a scare tactic to the crimes to deter others.
